explains: adj. 慷慨的，大方的；大量的，丰富的；宽宏大量的
wordGroup: be generous with 用…很大方

sentences.en: He was a generous self-sacrificing man.
sentences.cn: 他是一个慷慨大方、勇于自我牺牲的人。

sentences.en: They are very generous givers to charity.
sentences.cn: 他们是慈善事业的慷慨捐助者。

sentences.en: We will always remember his generous hospitality.
sentences.cn: 我们将永远记住他的慷慨好客。
